title: Drawing, "Design for a Coffeepot", ca. 1936
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite within area of handle: X; base of body: X
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cylindrical coffeepot with rounded spout drawn in plan and elevation, decorated with thick vertical bands cinched at the middle around the base of the body, the rounded lid surmounted by a similarly decorated finial with alternate drawing of taller arched finial. Elongated scroll handle connecting to the short cylindrical base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Coffeepot", ca. 1936.
ca. 1936. Graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-56.
